body_html:
It's not clear what the exact problem is here, but you probably need to run timelines profiler to find out what the op distributions are in each of your test cases. The memory allocator in android is also not as fast as the desktop (as is the cpu).

You might consider using the ssd work of @achowdhery which is quantized and should run faster on a phone.

body:
It's not clear what the exact problem is here, but you probably need to run timelines profiler to find out what the op distributions are in each of your test cases. The memory allocator in android is also not as fast as the desktop (as is the cpu). 

You might consider using the ssd work of @achowdhery which is quantized and should run faster on a phone.
